The TypeScript SDK allows you to connect, explore, and interact on the Libra blockchain. You can use it to request data, send transactions, set up test environments, and more!

```shellscript npm2yarn
npm i @libra2-core/ts-sdk
```

## Examples

<CardGrid>
  <LinkCard href="/build/sdks/ts-sdk/quickstart" title="Quickstart" description="See the quickstart to get a working demo in < 5 minutes" />

  <LinkCard href="https://github.com/libra2org/libra2-ts-sdk/tree/main/tests/e2e" title="Comprehensive Tests" description="See end to end tests which demonstrate how to use each feature of the SDK" target="_blank" />
</CardGrid>
